entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
